issue.title: [CF 1382] Demo Warlock T19 4pc bonus - extra Dreadstalker lifetime not shown on icon
issue.body:
With the Demo Warlock 4pc T19 bonus (Dreadstalkers live 4 seconds longer, a total of 16 seconds instead of 12) isn't reflected on an icon that's tracking Guardian:Dreadstalkers - when casting Dreadstalkers, the initial lifetime is still shown as 16 seconds.


> Posted by CurseForge user Aggieweasel | Imported from CurseForge issue #1382 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry, typo in my original message, with T19 4pc bonus the initial lifetime is still shown as 12 seconds, should be 16.

Edited Feb 21, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Aggieweasel

Sorry that I never fixed this. Now that T20 exists, I don't think this matters anymore at all.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
